output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: No CMF, but has CUI (which is different), showing it's from a political party 2. Refers to candidate: Yes, directly references Elena Lasconi, a presidential candidate 3. Addresses wide population: Yes, it's a paid advertisement with significant reach (70,000-80,000 impressions) 4. Electoral objective: Yes, clearly shows support for a presidential candidate through an influential political figure 5. Journalism: No, this is clearly a political message of support 6. Personal opinion: While it includes BÄƒsescu's opinion, it's being used in a paid political advertisement to influence voters
The post is particularly problematic because: - It directly promotes Elena Lasconi for the presidential election - It's being run after the campaign period has ended - It's a paid advertisement with significant reach - It uses a former president's endorsement to influence voters

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - It directly promotes a presidential candidate (Elena Lasconi) - It uses a former president's endorsement - It's a paid advertisement with significant reach - It's clearly intended to influence voters' decisions - The timing coincides with the post-campaign period for presidential elections
conclusion.message-for-police: Forta Dreptei, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea unui mesaj electoral platit pe Facebook si Instagram (ID postare: 1232129874723325) dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, in care se promoveaza candidatul Elena Lasconi la presedintie prin intermediul unei declaratii de sustinere din partea fostului presedinte Traian Basescu. Postarea reprezinta propaganda electorala conform Art. 36(7) din Legea 334/2006, avand obiectiv electoral explicit, adresandu-se publicului larg prin reclama platita (reach 70.000-80.000 impresii), si facand referire directa la un candidat la presedintie. Efectul electoral urmarit este influentarea intentiei de vot in favoarea candidatului mentionat, utilizand autoritatea si notorietatea fostului presedinte pentru a convinge electoratul.
